rules.ruleExpression:
"Registry Value:HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\Installer\SafeForScripting" exists  AND
"Registry Value:HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\Installer\SafeForScripting"."Data Type (Windows)" equals "REG_DWORD"  AND
"Registry Value:HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\Installer\SafeForScripting"."Integer Value (Windows)" equals 0

rules.name: Users must be prevented from changing installation options.
rules.notes:
Severity: medium
Weight:	10.0
VulnDiscussion: Installation options for applications are typically controlled by administrators.  This setting prevents users from changing installation options that may bypass security features.
IAControls: ECSC-1
ident: CCE-23712-3
ident: CCI-001812
Note: Remediation is not available.
rules.ruleExpression:
"Registry Value:HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\Installer\EnableUserControl" exists  AND
"Registry Value:HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\Installer\EnableUserControl"."Data Type (Windows)" equals "REG_DWORD"  AND
"Registry Value:HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\Installer\EnableUserControl"."Integer Value (Windows)" equals 0

rules.name: Nonadministrators must be prevented from applying vendor-signed updates.
rules.notes:
Severity: low
Weight:	10.0
VulnDiscussion: Uncontrolled system updates can introduce issues to a system.  This setting will prevent users from applying vendor-signed updates (though they may be from a trusted source).
IAControls: ECSC-1
ident: CCE-23601-8
ident: CCI-001812
Note: Remediation is not available.
rules.ruleExpression:
"Registry Value:HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\Installer\DisableLUAPatching" exists  AND
"Registry Value:HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\Installer\DisableLUAPatching"."Data Type (Windows)" equals "REG_DWORD"  AND
"Registry Value:HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\Installer\DisableLUAPatching"."Integer Value (Windows)" equals 1

rules.name: Access to Windows Online Troubleshooting Service (WOTS) must be prevented.
rules.notes:
Severity: low
Weight:	10.0
VulnDiscussion: Some features may communicate with the vendor, sending system information or downloading data or components for the feature.  Turning off this capability will prevent potentially sensitive information from being sent outside the enterprise and uncontrolled updates to the system.  
This setting prevents users from searching troubleshooting content on Microsoft servers.  Only local content will be available.
IAControls: ECSC-1
ident: CCE-24776-7
ident: CCI-000381
[V-21969]
Note: Remediation is not available.
rules.ruleExpression:
"Registry Value:HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\ScriptedDiagnosticsProvider\Policy\EnableQueryRemoteServer" exists  AND
"Registry Value:HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\ScriptedDiagnosticsProvider\Policy\EnableQueryRemoteServer"."Data Type (Windows)" equals "REG_DWORD"  AND
"Registry Value:HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\ScriptedDiagnosticsProvider\Policy\EnableQueryRemoteServer"."Integer Value (Windows)" equals 0

rules.name: Windows Peer-to-Peer networking services must be turned off.
rules.notes:
Severity: medium
Weight:	10.0
VulnDiscussion: Peer-to-Peer applications can allow unauthorized access to a system and exposure of sensitive data.  This setting will turn off the Microsoft Peer-to-Peer Networking Service.
IAControls: ECSC-1
ident: CCE-24398-0
ident: CCI-000381
Note: Remediation is not available.
rules.ruleExpression:
"Registry Value:HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Peernet\Disabled" exists  AND
"Registry Value:HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Peernet\Disabled"."Data Type (Windows)" equals "REG_DWORD"  AND
"Registry Value:HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Peernet\Disabled"."Integer Value (Windows)" equals 1

ruleGroups.name: Windows Time Service - Configure NTP Client

rules.name: The time service must synchronize with an appropriate DoD time source.
rules.notes:
Severity: low
Weight:	10.0
ident: CCI-001891
VulnDiscussion: The Windows Time Service controls time synchronization settings.  Time synchronization is essential for authentication and auditing purposes.  If the Windows Time Service is used, it must synchronize with a secure, authorized time source.   Domain-joined systems are automatically configured to synchronize with domain controllers.  If an NTP server is configured, it must synchronize with a secure, authorized time source.
Note : No remediation provided.
rules.ruleExpression:
if
   "Extended Object Entry:SYSTEM_TYPE//WS" exists
then
   "Registry Value:HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Policies\Microsoft\W32time\Parameters\Type"."String Value (Windows)" equals "NTP"  AND
   "Registry Value:HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Policies\Microsoft\W32time\Parameters\NTPServer" does not exist
else
   "Registry Value:HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Policies\Microsoft\W32time\Parameters\Type"."String Value (Windows)" equals "NT5DS"
end

rules.name: Windows must be prevented from using Windows Update to search for drivers.
rules.notes:
Severity: medium
Weight:	10.0
VulnDiscussion: Some features may communicate with the vendor, sending system information or downloading data or components for the feature.  Turning off this capability will prevent potentially sensitive information from being sent outside the enterprise and uncontrolled updates to the system.  
This setting prevents Windows from searching Windows Update for device drivers when no local drivers for a device are present.
IAControls: DCSL-1
ident: CCE-24071-3
ident: CCI-001812
Note: Remediation is not available.
rules.ruleExpression:
"Registry Value:HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\DriverSearching\DontSearchWindowsUpdate" exists  AND
"Registry Value:HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\DriverSearching\DontSearchWindowsUpdate"."Data Type (Windows)" equals "REG_DWORD"  AND
"Registry Value:HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\DriverSearching\DontSearchWindowsUpdate"."Integer Value (Windows)" equals 1

ruleGroups.name: Windows Update Point and Print Driver Search

rules.name: Windows Update must be prevented from searching for point and print drivers.
rules.notes:
Severity: low
Weight:	10.0
VulnDiscussion: Some features may communicate with the vendor, sending system information or downloading data or components for the feature.  Turning off this capability will prevent potentially sensitive information from being sent outside the enterprise and uncontrolled updates to the system.  
This setting will prevent Windows from searching Windows Update for point and print drivers.  Only the local driver store and server driver cache will be searched.
IAControls: ECSC-1
ident: CCE-24139-8
ident: CCI-001812
Note: Remediation is not available.
rules.ruleExpression:
"Registry Value:HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows NT\Printers\DoNotInstallCompatibleDriverFromWindowsUpdate" exists  AND
"Registry Value:HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows NT\Printers\DoNotInstallCompatibleDriverFromWindowsUpdate"."Data Type (Windows)" equals "REG_DWORD"  AND
"Registry Value:HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows NT\Printers\DoNotInstallCompatibleDriverFromWindowsUpdate"."Integer Value (Windows)" equals 1

rules.name: Standard user accounts must only have Read permissions to the Winlogon registry key.
rules.notes:
Ident: CCI-002235			  

Severity: high
Weight:	10.0
VulnDiscussion: Permissions on the Winlogon registry key must only allow privileged accounts to change registry values.  If standard users have this capability, there is a potential for programs to run with elevated privileges when a privileged user logs on to the system.
IAControls: ECCD-1, ECCD-2

Note: Remediation is not available.
rules.ruleExpression:
if
   "Registry Key:HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Winlogon" exists
then
   "Registry Key:HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Winlogon"."Permission ACL (DACL) (Windows)" has only ACEs matching masks ["*\Users Allow [-Set Value, -Create Subkey, -Create Link, -Delete, -Write DAC, -Write Owner]", "*\Administrators * []", "*\System * []", "*\TrustedInstaller * []", "*\ALL APPLICATION PACKAGES Allow [-Set Value, -Create Subkey, -Create Link, -Delete, -Write DAC, -Write Owner]"]
end
